name: SpellZone
description:
• WASD - Move
  • R.MB - Absorb Spell
  • L.MB - Attack with Spell
  • F - Fullscreen
  • Enter/Space/R - Restart on Death/Win

After absorbing 2 spells of the same element, you can use this element for a counterattack. But you might want to use it against an enemy that is weak to your absorbed element.

Try finding the lost artifact in every region. Bringing all 3 back to the shrine will save the land and its creatures from further falling to madness and infiltrating each others territories.
